## ProgressIndicatorService.showProgress() method

Displays progress indicator after short delay

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
showProgress(name: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | <code>string</code> | Name of progress group (separate counter) |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
